**Granted Power:** Character gains a +2 competence bonus on [[Appraise (Skill)|Appraise]], [[Disable Device (Skill)|Disable Device]], and [[Sleight of Hand (Skill)|Sleight of Hand]] checks.

**Greed Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Cheat (Spell)|Cheat]]****:** Caster rerolls when determining the success of a game of chance.

**2 [[Entice Gift (Spell)|Entice Gift]]:** Creature gives caster what itâ€™s holding.

**3** **[[Knock (Spell)|Knock]]****:** Opens locked or magically sealed door.

**4 Emotion:** Arouses strong emotion in subject.

**5** **[[Fabricate (Spell)|Fabricate]]****:** Transforms raw materials into finished items.

**6** **[[Guards and Wards (Spell)|Guards and Wards]]****:** Array of magical effects protects area.

**7 Vanish:** As *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]*, but affects a touched object.

**8 [[Phantasmal Thief (Spell)|Phantasmal Thief]]:** Creates an unseen force that steals from others.

**9** **[[Sympathy (Spell)|Sympathy]]****:** Object or location attracts certain creatures.
